CustomProfile.Description: Senjin Aleste is a vertical scrolling shooter that lets players switch between four different fighters on the fly, each with unique weapons. Each ship acts as a life; a destroyed ship returns after a cooldown. The game offers Novice, Casual, Original and Expert modes, which adjust bullet density and respawn times. Strategic ship‑swapping and bullet‑hell dodging make this a challenging yet accessible shoot‑’em‑up.
